column2: description
Bluetooth device implant for your ear.
Retail and wholesale pie factory with two retail locations in New Jersey.

Ava the Elephant is a godsend for frazzled parents of young children everywhere. This talking medicine dispenser makes it easy to administer medicine to little ones by turning the experience more playful and by providing positive reinforcement.
Organizing, packing, and moving services delivered by college women.
Interactive media centers for healthcare waiting rooms offering patients web access and educational information.

One of the first entrepreneurs to pitch on Shark Tank, Susan Knapp presented A Perfect Pear, her line of pear-focused gourmet food products. Sold across 650 retail stores, the Perfect Pear product portfolio includes jams, jellies, spreads, tapenades, vinegars, marinades, dressings and many others, all designed to showcase the flavors and health benefits of pears.
A mixed martial arts clothing line looking to become the next big brand of active sports / streetwear apparel.
Attach Noted is a detachable "arm" that holds Post-It notes on the side of a laptop screen.
A safety device for seatbelts. It prevents the driver from starting the vehicle unless the seatbelt is buckled.
An educational record label and publishing house designed to get students into learning about classic works of literature.
A battery-operated cooking device that siphons juice, has a silicone basting brush and an injector tip for marinades.
Household items with a twist: made from recycled chopsticks.
A line of books written to help children find inner calm.
Guitars with a folding neck, designed to fit into a backpack or an overhead compartment on an airplane.

50 State Capitals in 50 Fun Minutes is the most efficient and entertaining method to learn about US geography. This set of flash cards combines phonetics, cartoons, and associations to keep kids' interest and drive long-term learning and retention. Author Ken Bradford worked closely with public and private school teachers to develop this fun and satisfying study aide.
A franchise-model company offering professional graffiti removal.

Coverplay is a slipcover for children's play yards. Much like a mattress, play yards can't be laundered, yet babies and children spend lots of time in them, so you can guess what that leads to. Coverplay to the rescue! Fitting snugly over most standard size play yards, Coverplay offers a quick solution to add another layer of protection between your child and the germ-harboring surface of the play yard. Made of 95% cotton and 5% Lycra, Coverplay is machine-washable and easy to maintain. Indeed, throwing a Coverplay slipcover into the wash is much easier than trying to remove a spill that's gone directly onto the play yard. With their bright and stylish designs, they'll also make any play yard look as good as new.
A company that owns the trademarks for the words "Coffee," "Cappuccino," "Java" and other highly-caffeinated words for use on plush toys.
A web-based company that buys back and sells some of the 10% of all unused gift cards each year in the U.S.
Inspirational gifts and accessories such as colorful umbrellas and sandals that leave messages in the sand.
An online journaling service focused on facilitating users' progress towards achieving and maintaining their emotional well-being.

Granola Gourmet offers a line of granola bars that diabetics can safely enjoy. Unlike most granola bars on the market, Granola Gourmet's bars have a low glycemic index. Having a low glycemic index means that they are less prone to causing spikes in blood sugar, which aren't good for anybody and especially damaging for diabetics. Granola Gourmet's bars are made with ingredients that naturally have a low glycemic index, so they release their carbohydrates slowly into the bloodstream. Granola Gourmet products have been tested by GI Labs, which developed the glycemic index concept. They Ultimate Fudge Brownie bar has a glycemic index of just 23, well below the threshold to be considered low glycemic.
A fitness machine with a series of bands of varying weights to make pushups easier.
A funeral concierge service that writes the eulogy, officiates the funeral service and handles all the post-funeral family gatherings.
A line of surgical masks designed to be more fashionable and fun.
Sports bras engineered to work with a woman's body based on the activity she enjoys.
Made-to-order energy bars made with whole, natural ingredients. Customers can choose the ingredients that go into their highly personalized bars.
Pitched as a "root beer float in a bottle".
Sells award-winning barbecue spice and rub products.
Underwear designed to minimize the odor of flatulence, made of airtight material with elastic around the legs and a filter in the back.
A fitness program fusing dance routines.
Concept for a live entertainment and amusement attraction in the Times Square area with five venues featuring restaurants and entertainment.
Stainless steel identifying charms that you stick in your food before you grill.
A wheat-free soy-based modeling clay, designed for children with wheat allergies.
A company selling socks in "pairs" of three instead of two, aiming to preempt the problem of the missing sock.
Fashion accessories company focused on its unique hardware buckles and belts.
A web site that allows college students to buy and sell class notes and study guides.
Kids' organizers that look like stuffed animals for children.
Women's apparel specially designed for sizes 12 to 18.
A virtual reality locomotion simulator.
A healthier line of carbonated beverages featuring organic ingredients, vitamins, antioxidants, and just 85 calories per can.
Probiotic food for dogs and cats.
Custom-made bobblehead dolls.
A faux golf club that looks like a 7 iron but conceals a urine reservoir, for those times golfers need to relieve themselves but there is not a restroom nearby.
An online service allowing high school athletes and their parents to profile their skills to market themselves to colleges.
A protective covering for MP3 players and similar devices.

A printer ink refill service. They send the customer a backup ink cartrige to start with. Any time the customer runs out of ink, they send the dry cartridge back to Ink Flip, while they use the replacement cartridge. Ink Flip replaces the dry cartridge with a full one. The cycle repeats when the next cartridge runs out.
A chain of children's play and learning centers.
Salad dressings using a tasty blend of all-natural spices and seasonings.
A portable golf ball cleaner.
Designer helmets. The company owns a utility patent to place 3D designs on motorcycle helmets as well as any other kind of sporting helmet.
An ethical and eco-friendly apparel brand.
Individually-packaged degreasing cleaning wipes formulated for cyclists to easily remove grease and grime from working on bicycles.
A face-down tanning and massage pillow with storage pockets.
A store designed for kids to do the shopping.
A way to save the lipstick that gets stuck at the bottom of the tube.
A mobile novelty ice cream vending business.
A coffeehouse that is also a legal resource center.

Is that decaf? Are you sure? If you've ever felt paranoid about whether you're really getting decaf, and making sure that you're not unwittingly setting yourself up for a sleepless night, Caffeindicator could be for you. Caffeindicator is a litmus-like indicator to test whether coffee is regular or decaf. But this isn't a stand-alone product, at least not the way it was pitched. The idea is to get these indicators printed on the sugar or artificial sweetener packets that you see at the coffee shop, restaurant, or diner. It would have been a good idea for distribution, since it takes advantage of how these packets are already ubiquitous. Unfortunately for the caffeine-averse though, this product still hasn't hit the market, even years after its Shark Tank debut. What was demonstrated on the show was a mock prototype, and the entrepreneur hadn't even yet begun to approach the sweetener packet manufacturers or estimating the cost of such an add-on feature.

Move over, Legos! Qubits is a new construction toy for kids. Recommended for ages 4 to 16, even adults could have fun with these new shapes. Created by an independent inventor, Qubits encourage exploration in engineering, architecture, geometry and design. Unlike Lincoln Logs or Tinker Toys, or even Legos in recent years, there's no pre-determined plan to follow with Qubits, only your imagination. Parents will also appreciate that Qubits are dishwasher-safe! Qubits are 100% made in the USA.
A reinvented umbrella that is hands-free, impossible to invert, and protects the user from wind chill.
A liquid, organic fertilizer made from "llama doo".

If you want to shake things up in your greeting card practices, why not deliver those happy sentiments on a bouncy ball instead? The medium is the message, after all. Send-A-Ball will literally send a bouncy ball in the mail on your behalf to any recipient you designate. Your greetings will be all the more happily received this way! Send-A-Ball is run by two sisters who live across the street from each other, and wanted to have a business that would give them the freedom and flexibility to spend time with their families.
A home-based shoe business with a sales model similar to Tupperware parties.

Collar stays: can't live with 'em, can't live without 'em. For any man that has struggled to keep their collars pert and upright, and suffered the constant shifting of their plastic collar stays, there's Wurkin Stiffs. This company makes men's accessories for the long haul, offering solutions to common inconveniences in men's apparel. The Wurkin Stiffs signature product is the Power Stays, which are kept securely in place by strong magnets. While Power Stays are made for men's dress shirts, the company also produces Polo Stays that keep your polo shirts looking crisp. Wurkin stiffs has expanded to offer a full suite of men's accessories, including cufflinks, RFID wallets, money clips, tie bars, and travel bags.
Dance education centers for children.
Premium wine sold by the glass in individually-sealed plastic cups.
Food products by Chef Big Shake. The flagship product is the Original Shrimp Burger.
A subscription toy service.
An alarm clock that wakes up the user with freshly cooked bacon.

Allergy season bringing you down? Maybe it's time to give First Defense Nasal Screens a try. These screens ward off allergies without medication. First Defense Nasal Screens are self-adhesive strips that attach to your nose to cover the nasal passage. They filter the air coming in through your nose and keeps allergens out. This product has been tested to significantly reduce 99% of particles at 10 microns. Even at sub micron levels they have been shown to be effective by 77% or more.

Vurtego is a high-tech pogo stick that is super lightweight, ultra durable, and nearly silent. It provides the smoothest and highest performance pogo ride anywhere. Eschewing the traditional pogo stick spring, Vurtego's bounce comes from compressed air instead. Before hopping on, you simply pump it up using any bike pump or air compressor. The cylinder body is made of aircraft aluminum and the footpeg assembly locks the user's feet to the pogo stick securely during the bounce. Made in the USA, Vurtego comes fully assembled and ready to bounce you to new heights!
Rubber bands that increase the resistance in your exercise activities.

Mod Mom Furniture is stylish, high-quality, made-to-order furniture for children's bedrooms and playrooms. These carefully crafted pieces are long-lasting, so they can serve your child over many years. The company was founded by the eponymous mom who was dissatisfied with the current offerings on the market, which were expensive and uninspired. Mod Mom Furniture sources eco-friendly materials, including sustainable and formaldehyde-free wood and varnishing products.

FlipOutz are flexible silicon bracelets that can hold five coins of your choosing. Kids can personalize their Flip Outz with any five of numerous available choices. You can also swap out coins, trade them with friends, and even set up an online profile which lets you show off the coins you have and see where your traded coins have traveled over time.

Pure Ayre Odor Eliminator is for anyone who owns pets or has ever faced off against lingering smells. What makes Pure Ayre different than other smell-neutralizing sprays is that it uses natural enzymes to break down the smelly compounds. Pure Ayre banishes bad odors without harsh chemicals, alcohol, bacteria, or citrus. It's effective on even the most offensive smells, for example vomit, skunk spray, and kennel odors. Once you buy your first 14 oz. or 22 oz. spray bottle of Pure Aure Odor Eliminator, you can buy it by the gallon and continue to reuse the bottle.
A country-style apparel store sold through Sports Authority, truck stops and travel plazas.
A children's seat attachable to luggage that instantly converts it into a travel stroller.
Premium beef jerky made without additives or preservatives.
A rubber band that works as a money clip.
An aromatic lip gloss designed to help curb appetite.
Light-up decals for car windows.
Small cases for mints, gum and contact lenses featuring a clip that allows them to be attached to belts, backpacks, or other travel gear.
A magnetic skin with a decorative finish that can be applied to any appliance.
A new kind of broom with a built-in scraper.
Accessories for casual golfers. The flagship product is the Par 6 cooler, which can keep a six-pack of beer stored in the shoe pocket of any golf bag.
Cakes made from scratch from family recipes. They ship nationwide and orders can be placed online.
Designer hospital gowns for expecting moms.
An impact-resistant hydration system that attaches to shoulder pads, aimed at football players in training.
A mobile entertainment company running specialized vehicles with movie theaters and video games.
A barf bag worn around the neck, for small children who are prone to carsickness.
A push mower marketed as a more eco-friendly alternative than powered mowers.
A line of candles that come in "manly" scents of pot roast, golf course, football, popcorn and draft beer, among others.
Non-stick fabric aisle runners for wedding ceremonies and special events.
The Rocket, the company's flagship product, can turn anything into a speaker through its vibrations.
Hy-Conn is a super-fast connector for fire hydrants and garden hoses. The Pro Edition can be connected to any fire hydrant without the use of adapters or tools. The Home edition is for garden hoses.

The patented CitiKitty Cat Toilet Training Kit uses a proven, disappearing litter box technique that has successfully toilet trained cats for decades. CitiKitty's specially-designed training seat fits ALL toilets and transitions cats of all age, size, and breed from litter box to toilet. Any healthy cat, three months of age or older that is successfully using a litter box is a candidate for toilet training.
T-shirts for expectant moms that display the due date.
Shoes with interchangeable uppers allowing the user to easily vary their look.
Aldo Orta Jewelry makes fashion jewelry with a royal theme.
A water container that unscrews from the bottom as well as the top for ease of cleaning.
A website where people can pre-purchase a night out on the town without the fear of getting turned away from a venue.
Professional ghost-writing services company.
Personalized services for planning your own funeral in advance. They have partnered with a large insurance company for a plan that gives people the opportunity to prepay for their funeral.
An online service where people can buy made-to-order cartoon drawings of cats, which are posted to the website.
A system to teach how to make successful sales pitches and step-by-step guides on what to say to prospective customers.
A cargo management system that can transform a pickup truck into a bigger cargo-carrying vehicle in about 30 seconds with racks that fold out of the back bed.
Concept for a family-friendly magic show in Las Vegas.

Chord Buddy is a one-of-a-kind learning system for the guitar that gets you playing from day one. Attach these tabs to your acoustic or electric guitar (right-handed only, sorry!) and you're ready to make music. Chord Buddy basically turns your real-life guitar into one as easy to play as those in your favorite Rock Band or Guitar Hero games. One at a time, you remove hte tabs and learn to play the chords on your own. Using the included instruction book, songbook, and DVD with two-month lesson plan, you can learn over 100 songs on your own!

Liquid Money answers the question: what if I smelled like a million bucks, instead of just looking like it? Not literally though! That would be unfortunate. Liquid Money for Him is formulated to smell like success. The fragrance opens with a woodsy aroma that gives way to notes of citrus, rosemary, grass, and ocean breeze. The company was founded and is led by Pat McCarthy, a sales executive with experience at top enterprise software companies. Liquid Money's website even asserts the product is used at Microsoft, salesforce, and SAP. Not to forget the ladies, Liquid Money is also available in a women's formulation. All products come in a box packed with real shredded US dollar bills, just to really drive home the point!
Attachable lighted patches for jean pockets.

You Smell Soap is luxurious without taking itself too seriously. Made natural ingredients like shea butter and olive oil, You Smell Soap is fragrant yet gentle and soothing on the skin. Made with shea butter and olive oil, these bars create an unmatched soft and creamy lather. You Smell Soap is naturally fragrant yet gentle and soothing on your skin. Each bar comes wrapped in its signature "You Smell" packaging that is vintage-inspired and truly conversation-sparking. You Smell Soap is vegan and free of parabens, phthalates, and gluten.
A canine-friendly cake mix that is safe for dogs to eat.
A comfy outfit that combines a sweatshirt and a blanket.

Wine Balloon (now sold under the name Air Cork) A product that preserves wine inside any already-opened bottle. It works by inflating a balloon inside the bottle to crowd out the air and prevent it from being in contact with the wine.
A towel that is designed like a poncho so that kids can change out of their wet bathing suits without anyone seeing.
A water-resistant and, even better, racoon-resistant fabric cover for garbage bins of all sizes.
A wedge-styled pillow specially designed for women with large breasts so they can lie on their stomachs comfortably
Designer whole-leaf teas and accessories.
Adjustable necklaces and bracelets with interchangeable accents for kids and adults of all ages.

Five-Minute Furniture is a system that allows for furniture that's easily assembled without hand tools, screws or bolts. Modular and customizable, the patented Five-Minute Furniture system comes in a variety of sizes, and allows users to built the furniture that best suits their living space. When not in use, it packs flat just as easily as it is assembled. Five-Minute Furniture was created by an architect who was inspired by a prefabricated bookshelf that caught his attention while he worked at a retail store.

The Painted Pretzel sells creative, gourmet chocolate-covered pretzel confections in brick-and-mortar retail stores and online. The business offers pretzel knots, pretzel rods, pretzel bark and and pretzel turtles in a variety of flavors and sizes, configured into bundles and samplers. The company has also expanded into corporate gifts, and they count numerous Fortune 500 companies among their customers. Since appearing on the show, The Painted Pretzel has also begun to do fundraising business. Organizations seeking to raise money can buy customized pretzels for resale towards their cause.

Esso Watches are ionized wristwatches that claim to improve your body's energy field. Now branded TAGI Gear, the company currently sells TAGI watches that are made of silicone and still claim to be equipped with negative ion technology, although such claims appear to have taken a backseat to the aesthetic appeal of the watches. There are two TAGI watch models: a digital version and an analog version. Both are water resistant and available in a number of fun color choices.

ReadeREST is a magnetized clip that holds your eyewear when it's not in use. It works for reading glasses, sunglasses, and even some non-eyewear items that you might need to keep close at hand, like your work ID or maybe a pen. You can skip the granny chains and the lanyards and simply attach your ReadeREST to any shirt. The strong magnets will keep the clip securely in its place, while the V-shape provides a convenient resting place for those items that are always going astray.
Redirects the hot air from any home clothes dryer back into the house, rather than outside, where it helps keep the warmth during cold months.

The Smart Baker is known for their insightfully helpful kitchen tools. The company is known for their collapsible cupcake stands, which display up to 100 cupcakes and stores flat when not in use. These cupcake stands are also adjustable, so you can adapt your configuration based on how many treats you plan to serve. The Smart Baker has also brought us pre-cut parchment paper, which you can purchase in round or rectangular shapes according to the molds you'll be using them in. These super helpful pre-cut sheets are outfitted with tabs that poke out the sides, which you can use to lift your cake out of the mold when done. You might also know The Smart Baker for their cheat sheet aprons, which are adorned with useful measuring and conversion tables. These aprons can save you from stains, spills, and measuring mistakes.

ScotteVest stands for travel-ready apparel and accessories for men and women. The ScotteVest signature product feature is pockets, lots of pockets for storing and stashing essentials when you're on the go. ScotteVest takes pockets so seriously, in fact, that the number of pockets in each article is listed up front alongside the pricing in their online store. Although the company initially focused on vests, of course, its offerings have gradually expanded to include products such as hoodies, shirts, polos, hats, and even boxers. Overwhelmed by the options? The online store even has a "Help Me Decide" feature to make product comparisons easier.

Kisstixx is a fun lip balm that comes in pairs according to compatible flavors. Each Kisstixx lipstick (try saying that three times fast) packs a punch of flavor, and they're paired to mix well when they come together in a kiss. Best of all, this lip balm keeps your lips protected and moisturized. Wear it every day to stay at your most kissable!

Nardo's Natural is a line of premium-quality organic skin care products proudly made in the USA. Their products range from facial care, to body care, to make-up, and even a line just for men. Always made with premium materials, you'll find things like coconut oil, shea butter, bentonite clay, acai berry and pomegranate among the ingredients. Just as important is what you won't find: all Nardo's Natural products are free of parabens, dyes, gluten or harsh chemicals. Nardo's Natural offers facial cleansers, anti-aging creams, make-up, body washes, exfoliants, moisturizers, and even after shave. The company also offers private label and contract manufacturing services for businesses and up-and-coming cosmetics businesses.
Fashion-forward and edgy jewelry such as headpieces, body jewelry, and shoe jewelry.
A mobile training device that simulates a basketball defender.
A way to connect trustworthy senior citizens with customers seeking childcare and other household services.
A clear adhesive that lifts and repositions the skin to miminize sagging and cellulite, making thighs look firm and tight.
Educational software that teaches people how to play the guitar, ukulele, banjo and other instruments.
Stand-up paddle boarding products.
A strainer designed to aerate wine as it is poured into the glass.
A service that creates customized articles of clothing.
Beer-infused ice cream.
A line of fully-protective and fashionable safety gear for people who ride scooters and motorcycles.
Prepackaged meal for pets, featuring separate compartments containing full servings of premium food portioned accordingly for different sizes and species of pets.
An electric generator that claims to harnesses the spin of the earth and produces gold as a waste product.
Motivating workout apparel, featuring secret logos that are made visible by the wearer's perspiration.
Premium wine sold by the glass in individually-sealed plastic cups.
A company that handcrafts 25 varieties cookies and brownies, which are sold to corporate customers and in the company's own retail stores.
A line of fashionable handbags featuring "magna-fab", a removable magnet that attaches to the front of the bag, allowing for the design to be changed up.

NailPak by Duality Cosmetics is the most portable manicure solution and a touching story. A mother's bonding ritual with her daughters turned commercial success, NailPak came from their evenings together spent doing each others' nails. They came up with NailPak, a self-contained package that combines nail polish and polish remover along with pads and a file.

Lollacup is one well-engineered sippy cup. It comes with a valve-free, weighted straw that small children can easily learn to drink from, even when Lollacup is tilted. The cup also has handles for easy gripping, but they are removable in case Lollacup needs to be put into a cupholder. Made in the USA, Lollacup is also dishwasher safe and made with materials that are FDA-approved to be used by young children.
Tank tops with interchangeable straps.
Boots that transform into a shoe and back again. The removable (and interchangeable) boot uppers are attached to the shoe portion by a zipper.
A roller-coaster ride powered by the people riding it.
An online store for customizable bicycles.

AirBedz are air mattresses purpose-built for use on the beds of pick-up trucks. An AirBedz air mattress will always fit perfectly on a truck bed thanks to specially-designed cutouts on each side, which fit snugly over the wheel wells. Available sizes to fit compact, mid and full-sized trucks, every AirBedz mattress also includes a built-in, battery-powered, rechargeable pump for easy inflation. The unique design of AirBedz maximizes the usable area on the truck bed, while the 12-inch thickness and integrated air coil system assures comfort.
A fun, all-inclusive dance workout for people of all ages, shapes and sizes.
Interchangeable swimsuit separates designed to be mixed up.
A rock band.

Now doing business under the Wild Friends brand, these enterprising college students went into the tank with their wholesome and creatively flavored line of nut butters. Their all-natural nut butters come in delightful flavor combinations such as honey pretzel, cinnamon raisin, sesame cranberry, chocolate coconut, and vanilla espresso. Can't decide on a nut butter? Wild Friends offers variety packs. Want your nut butters on the go? They come in travel-friendly single serve sizes too. These days, Wild Friends sells their peanut butter, almond butter, and sunbutter products online and in major food retailers across the US.
An energy drink marketed to women over the age of 35.
Socially-conscious, recyclable sneakers.
A home gym for a total body workout.
UniKey provides a smart lock system called Kevo that works with smartphones and the specially-made Kevo fob.
A massage therapy system in which the therapist walks on the patient's back.
A ticketless coat checking system for events.
Non-toxic bedbug glue traps.
A belt featuring a buckle that opens to make a beverage holder.

eCreamery makes small-batch ice cream, gelato, and sorbet in classic and experimental flavors alike. Aside from their brick-and-mortar location in Omaha, they also have a strong online presence, and will ship a pint of any flavor directly to your door. With eCreamery, the customer wields the scoop, so to speak. You can customize any order or even create your own flavor outright. eCreamery will hand-pack your frozen treat in pints or even batches of single-serve cups, with personalized labels of your choosing.
Alpha M is a program consisting of six DVDs that help men analyze and build the perfect basic wardrobe.
Surf-inspired exercise equipment and group fitness classes.
A messaging app that hides a list of contacts that the user wants to keep secret, then intercepts calls and messages to and from those contacts.
A patent-pending strap that keeps the wearer's posture perfect.
A new kind of reusable diaper, made in a pocket style that holds a microfiber pad inside.
A way to wear healing stones around your wrist and make a fashion statement.
A brand of cookies that eschews traditional ingredients in favor of making them gluten-free and vegan.
A hamper with a bungee spring-loaded liner that drops when heavy clothes go in, but then springs back up when you take them out.
Back 9 Dips are buffalo chicken dips created with all white meat chicken breasts along with wing and dipping sauces.
An exoskeleton device that gives structure to any plastic zipper bag to create a handy and sturdy bowl.
A product that attaches to your keychain and warns if you've walked away from your phone.
Pillowcase dresses that grow alongside kids, as they are tied with ribbons that allow their height to be adjusted.

Expensive beauty products get a little more affordable thanks to the Spatty, which helps ordinary people salvage 15% to 25% of their cosmetics. Without these handy little spatulas, you're likely throwing out as much as a quarter of the contents of your expensive makeup, eye cream, face lotion, and other beauty products. The Spatty comes in 6-inch and 12-inch sizes so it can reach into tight containers to rescue the contents that you've been unable to reach in and scoop out. Whether you're pinching pennies or just a conscious consumer, the Spatty quickly pays for itself!

If you don't like to swallow pills, you may feel like there aren't any wellness supplements out there for you. Marz Sprays came up with a solution. Their supplements are designed and packaged as oral sprays. Just a spritz in your mouth and you're good to go. Marz Sprays has five different sprays on offer: ReBoot, Restorative, C-Spray, Slim, and Juicy. C-Spray is their top-seller, a blend of Vitamin C, Vitamin B-12, Vitamin D, Echinacea and other ingredients chosen to boost the immune system. There are Marz Sprays to cover just about anything you might want out of a supplement. Sleep Spray helps you relax and have a restful slumber. ReBoot wakes you up with caffeine. Slim is formulated to help with weight loss. Meanwhile, Juicy is a more general multi-vitamin supplement that's designed to take in small, multiple doses throughout the day.
An energy drink made in the form of a waffle, featuring as much caffeine as a 20-oz cup of coffee.

Mother Nature does it again! Eco Nuts is all-natural laundry detergent that grows on trees. Related to the lychee, soapnuts (also called soapberries) naturally produce a mild surfactant that can be used for laundering clothes. Used for thousands of years by people in Asia, where these shrubs and small trees are common, you can now purchase your own soapnuts for your own laundry! From Eco Nuts, you can purchase these soapberries ready to use, de-seeded and sterilized with no added chemicals. To use them, just toss a few Eco Nuts into the wash with your clothes, and let them do their work. Eco Nuts are certified USDA organic and reusable.
Protein-infused flavored water.
A lobster roll food truck run by two cousins originally from Maine, operating in Southern California.
Stretchy, creative beverage cozies.
A modern take on the slip.

Possibly the most successful product in Shark Tank history, Scrub Daddy is a smiley sponge that packs real cleaning power. Dip in warm water to make Scrub Daddy soft and squishy, or run cold water over it to make it firm for those tasks that require a more muscle. Safe on non-stick cookware, china, wood, stainless steel, and counter tops, Scrub Daddy is your go-to sponge for cleaning. Its round shape makes it ergonomically friendly for those times you have to clean the inside of a bottle or container, while the Scrub Daddy smile is also a wonderful tool for easily cleaning spoons and spatulas.
An ice cream treat that is safe for dogs.

Focus Designs is the maker of the self-balancing unicycle, or the SBU for short. The SBU is a battery-powered unicycle with built-in sensors that keep the rider balanced and moving forward with no need for pedaling. The rider controls the SBU with just their natural leaning motions, and according to the company, it takes only about 20-30 minutes to learn. The SBU is strong yet lightweight, supporting over 300 lbs. on its mere 27-pound frame and accelerating to 10mph in just 3 seconds. The SBU reaches a max speed of 12.5 mph and can take hills of up to a 30% grade.
A plastic lid that can turn any plate into an airtight container for food storage.
The No Fly Cone is designed to be placed over dog, horse and cattle feces to trap flies. It is non-toxic and doesn't require any added attractant.
Cool Wazoo is a cover that redirects heat back to its source while serving five different functions. It can be a swing cover, high chair cover, shopping cart cover, car shade and a changing pad.
General computer proficiency classes taught remotely online, instead of in a classroom or home setting.
A search engine for real estate.

Ice Chips are sugar-free hard candy sweetened with Xylitol and smashed to bits into its distinctive "ice chips" shape. The business is run by two enterprising friends, Bev Vines-Haines and Charlotte Clary, who over their years of friendship have worked on a tons of ideas and projects until finally coming across Ice Chips. These two grandmothers have 37 grandchildren between them and wanted to make a candy that was healthy yet tasted good enough that their brood would like it too.
Costumes that instantaneously transform the wearer from a human into a motorized vehicle.
A subscription service for neckwear.
Caffeine-free nutrition shot designed and tested by special ops forces.
An online boutique where brides can buy and resell used wedding dresses.
An atmospheric dinner and drinks cruise.
A nightlife fashion accessory that replaces a handbag by allowing the wearer to carry her essentials around her leg instead.
A company that rents live, potted Christmas trees as an eco-friendly and good-spirited alternative to cut trees.
Lactose-free fudge treats made from goat's milk.
A kid-friendly cappuccino bar that both parents and children can enjoy.
Prepackaged, peel-off face paint in a wide variety of designs.
Professional-quality hair care products for children without harsh chemicals.
Arkeg is an arcade game with a beer keg built into its side.
A tabletop food screen that protects food from outdoors pests, featuring a Velcro-fastened door allowing easy access for people.
A washer and dryer bag specifically designed to protect children's beloved stuffed animals from damage in the wash.

Urbio is an innovative modular solution for urban gardening and small space organization. Made with light-weight and durable polypropylene plastic and neodymium magnets, Urbio is a recyclable product available in a variety of vessel sizes.
A chain of ice cream shops where the ice cream is made to-order using liquid nitrogen for rapid freezing.

Coffee Joulies are an inventive new way to keep your coffee at its ideal temperature for hours. Simply drop the silver-colored "beans" into your coffee and they will absorb heat when it is too hot, and later release this heat as your drink cools off. Coffee Joulies get your coffee ready to drink (without burning your tongue) sooner and keep it comfortably hot for over five hours. Coffee Joulies use a non-toxic proprietary "phase change material" that is encased in foodsafe stainless steel shells. The material absorbs heat above 140 degrees Fahrenheit and releases heat below that threshold. The set of Coffee Joulies includes five Joulies and a carrying pouch.
Kids can listen to voice recordings from a loved one through this teddy bear, which is equipped to receive the recordings remotely from the sender.
A magnetic, power-free sound amplifier for the iPad.
Bibs designed for better coverage and made with a patented fabric that stays stain-free.
Sandals designed to be biomechanically identical to being barefoot while still adding a layer of protection.
A beverage holder that keeps drinks cold.
Grinds, or Grinds Coffee Pouches, are small pouches of flavored coffee. Grinds is a tobacco- and nicotine-free product.
A pillowcase with a built-in hood for added coziness. Also available as an inflatable travel pillow.
An eco-friendly and functional reusable garment bag that doubles as a hamper.
A chain of quick-service establishments selling quality made-to-order sushi rolls.
A device for reducing distrated driving behaviors, Smartwheel is built into a vehicle's steering wheel and alerts drivers when they engage in unsafe driving positions.

An online portal providing mental health services geared towards women. Pretty Padded Room connects clients with licensed female therapists via video chats or digital diaries for a fraction of the price paid for in-person therapy sessions.

Gotta Have S'more marries muffins with s'mores to make the utterly irresistible s'muffin. The classic camping snack has grown up into a classy and self-contained treat, but just as delectable as always. Although it's more buttoned-up, the s'muffin is still made up of the traditional s'more building blocks: graham cracker, toasted marshmallow, and chocolate. The company doesn't mess around with creative flavors, and that's for the best, because we don't see why you'd want to mess with perfection. If you want to mix things up though, they will make you specialized s'muffins decorated to suit your occassion, whether it's a corporate event, a wedding, or something else altogether. S'muffins are sold on the company's online store and are also available at Williams-Sonoma.
A new line of denim designed to enhance the figure and minimize fashion faux pas.
Hunting apparel made with a new, specially-designed type of camouflage pattern.
Hand-crafted eyewear made from sustainable wood.

Addison's Wonderland makes enchanting bedding and decor for nurseries and children's rooms. Made in the USA, Addison's Wonderland sells a full line of furnishings including duvet covers, upholstered headboards and window treatments.

PSI Bands apply gentle accupressure to the wearer's wrists, focusing on Nei-Guan acupressure points believed to provide relief from nausea. The company recommends its bracelets for nausea resulting from causes such as motion sickness or pregnancy. Available in several colors and sold in pairs (one for each wrist), PSI bands are adjustable and waterproof.
A device for affordable at-home tattoo removal through a process that does not break the surface of the skin, called Black Magic IPL.

Nuts 'N More is a line of high-protein nut butters, fortified with whey isolate protein and flaxseed and never with added sugars. Choose from peanut butter, almond butter, and even sesame butter, plain or blended into delicious and unexpected flavor combinations, including Toffee Crunch, Chocolate, and Pumpkin Spice. Each serving of Nuts 'N More butters contains over 10g of protein along with healthy Omega-3 oils, plenty of dietary fiber, and low amounts of net carbs. While most other nut butters on the market--even the more savory ones--tend to be sweetened with sugar, Nuts 'N More instead adds xylitol.
A line of shoes that can be continually transformed and updated through interchangeable parts.
A brand of accessories to protect electronic devices with an additional safety net. The accessories all include insurance in case the device still suffers damage even while outfitted with Cellhelmet.
Baby Loves Disco throws parties that kids and parents can enjoy out of their custom-fitted disco van.
A training program featuring the full-body Rodeo Abs machine and a software package that calculates your ideal heart rate for working out most efficiently.
A versatile and comfortable beanbag chair that unzips into a bed.

Drop Stop offers 100% coverage of the dreaded "carmuter triangle", that space in your car where your belongings and stray debris go to disappear. Of course, the "carmuter triangle" refers to the gap between your seat and the center console. The patented Drop Stop has a built-in slot that attaches it to the seat belt catch and keeps it securely in place, assuring full coverage of that gap even if you move your seat. Made with a high grade neoprene casing, DropStop expands or compresses to fit according to the shape of your car's seats and center console, making it a universal fit for all cars and trucks.

Coolwraps offers an easier and frankly, much cooler, way to get your presents wrapped speedily and professionally. Your gift goes into one of these easy-to-use shrink wrap bags, then you shrink-seal them with any household hair dryer. Available in three patterns--Celebration, Balloons, and Hearts--you can choose the one that best suits the occasion. Each Coolwraps package contains nine shrink wrap gift bags with three of each size: small, medium, and large. Coolwraps come in handy for any shape of gift, but it's especially genius when it comes to irregularly shaped presents like stuffed animals or home accessories.

Simple Sugars is a line of all-natural skincare products for sensitive skin. Made by a young entrepreneur who has first-hand experience with sensitive skin, Simple Sugars is formulated with sugar as the primary exfoliant and blended with noncomedogenic oils and botanicals to make effective yet gentle products that anyone can safely use.

Traditional Fisheries is the only commercial supplier of lionfish. The company's system of harvesting lionfish yields ample supply and reduces the lionfish population, which is an added benefit because this invasive species is crowing out other varieties of fish in many areas. Lionfish are currently at no risk of over-fishing; completely the contrary, actually. For this reason, it's a fantastic choice of seafood for those seeking to consume fish sustainable. Every lionfish you eat saves a number of more endangered fish from being harvested and/or crowded out of their natural habitat.
A cooler with a built-in LED light that turns on when the lid is opened, illuminating the contents inside.
A full-body costume that covers the wearer completely, including their head.
A water bottle with a built-in filter.

Echo Valley Meats is a retail, online gift catalog and catering company and is quickly becoming a household name. Premium meats, smoked hams, and award winning sausages make personal and corporate gift giving easy and full of flavor.

The Mission Belt is a no-holes belt that instead adjusts using an innovated ratchet system. Because it's not restricted by scarce holes, it can be fitted to any size. The ratchet's teeth are spaced mere fourths of an inch apart. Mission Belt is also about the social mission: every belt contributes a dollar towards fighting global hunger.
A device that converts the energy from walking into electricity to charge your devices on the go.

Shell Bobbers are just that: fishing bobbers made of used shotgun shells. If you have a hunting and fishing enthusiast in your life, you can rest assured that they will appreciate the idea from  the moment they see it. These Shell Bobbers are no novelty item, they are fully-functional bobbers that float upright, well above the water line, and remain visible and easy to spot. Use Shell Bobbers in any fishing situation and enjoy the fact that you're giving a second life to scrap shot gun shells that would otherwise be cluttering the landfill.
Individually packaged cupcake-in-a-jar, sold in retail and shipping nationwide.
A squirrel-proof birdfeeder featuring a remote control that allows the user to administer a static shock to any squirrel that happens to be on the feeder.
A subscription service that delivering an assortment of coffees for at-home brewing.
A fully-seasoned gumbo base in the form of a brick.
Premium kitchen products made from regular grained and figured wood.
Spacious photobooths filled with props.
Baby's Badass Burgers serves gourmet burgers from its bright pink mobile food truck.
A balance bike for kids to work up to riding on two-wheeled bicycles. Rather than using training wheels, KaZam forgoes the pedals and encourages kids to safely practice their balance.
A motorcycle-themed full-length action film.
A door-to-door luggage shipping service for travelers to avoid the hassle of taking luggage through the airport.
Custom-built heirloom gaming furniture.

Stella Valle produces a line of jewelry that embodies inner strength and self-reliance. Founded by two sisters who are veterans of the US military, their designs evoke their military background and unique aesthetic sensibilities. Balancing masculine and feminine design elements and details, this jewelry is designed for brave women who set the bar high and persist through adversity.
Authentic-tasting, traditional scones made in America.
An invite-only dating site for single professionals.
A mobile app that connects users to professional translators on demand.
A chain of grilled cheese and tomato soup shops.

Now doing business as Ry's Ruffery, this business started after Ryan's family adopted a rescue beagle. The family was taken aback by the poor quality of some of the dog treats on the market, and decided to make a better dog biscuit. Ryan, then 10 years old, took initiative to talk to veterinarians and test new flavor combinations, experimenting with his mom's help. Once they settled on a recipe, Ryan took to the streets to sell his doggie treats from his bike. Today, Ry's Ruffery offers three different flavors: cheddar, peanut butter, and pumpkin apple. These healthy dog treats are sold online and in pet stores across the country.

What is this? We're hearing about a tight-knit family, a closely guarded secret, and mouth-watering pickles. It sounds like a motion picture but it's Lynnae's Gourmet Pickles, and although the recipe remains a secret, you can buy the finished product and enjoy the taste for yourself. The recipe comes from Lynnae's Great Grandma Toots, a.k.a. Mrs. Pickles. Her recipe has united the family's women for over a century. Now Lynnae, together with her sister-in-law Aly, is bringing its goodness to the masses.
A social network for the medical community.
Cake balls produced for the mass market and retailing at convenience stores.
An easy-to-use mobile app that allows you to take a photograph from your phone and instantly send it as a real printed postcard.

Breathometer makes breathalyzer tests accessible for consumers by leveraging users' smartphones. Easily plugging into any smartphone's audio jack, Breathometer makes it easier than ever to gauge your blood alcohol content. The user simply exhales onto the sensor and the results are displayed onscreen, much like using any other breathalyzer. Breathometer's smartphone app also estimates how long until a user may be able to drive safely again, and can even call you a local cab if needed.

Kane & Couture sells trendy yet affordable accessories for stylish pups. For stylish dog lovers, Kane & Couture offers doggie apparel, harnesses, collars, leashes, and carriers in a range of styles, from urban-chic, to sporty, to glam. Even their doggie poopie bag holder is attractively styled in gray denim and decked with shiny studs! The company runs three brands: The Kane & Couture Signature line, Bubba Dog Collection, and Imperial Pup.

There's no better way to say it: spread it, mix it, shake it, stir it! Mango Mango are fruit preserves that are wildly popular among the crowds that attend the parties organized by these three go-getter founders. Finally they decided to make the preserves for retail sale, appropriately described as a party in a jar. There are over 100 ways to use Mango Mango to liven up your menu. Spread it on bread or crackers, mix with cream cheese to make a dip, combine with vinegar and olive oil to make vinaigrettes and marinades, or invent your own!
Gag medals for when men complete household chores.
"Magic" aromatherapy sprays for kids to help alleviate common fears and anxieties.
A modern version of the chef's hat, which keeps the smell of food out of hair.

Ramen noodles just got an upgrade. If you love ramen but hate fussing with kettles or pots of boiling water, Rapid Ramen Cooker is for you. This sturdy, microwave-safe plastic tray holds a block of ramen and provides an indicator line showing how much water to be added. From there, you just pop it in the microwave and enjoy your new favorite ramen preparation.

The Freeloader is the ultimate child carrier for active families, designed to be ultra-light, super portable and extra safe and strong. This child carrier supports more weight than any other, and effectively distributes it through its padded and contoured shoulder straps and padded waist strap. The Freeloader is also designed with safety in mind, featuring a five-point harness system to hold your child in place.

Surf-style comes to skateboards with Hamboards. Founded by a family of lifeguards in southern California, Hamboards makes skateboards that are like surfing on land. The company makes several models of longboards and skateboards, with names like Pinger, Pescadito, and the Biscuit.

Scan is a QR reader and barcode scanner app for your smartphone. Join all the other smart consumers and use Scan at retailers to compare product prices in a flash. Businesses and individuals can also create QR codes for free at Scan's website, and use their to promote their companies on business cards and social media. The Scan app is available for iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows phones.

ScreenMend is an easy and cost-effective way to patch window screens. By applying just a bit of heat over the patch, with any blow dryer you have around the house, ScreenMend patches become securely affixed to the screen. This clever invention came from a serendipitous discovery that a father and daughter stumbled upon as they did work around the house.

Sunday Night Slow Jams is a radio show mixing slow jams from past and present. Nationally syndicated across 80 cities, Sunday Night Slow Jams has an audience of over 1 million listeners. The show also has a live concert tour every year during February, appropriately so, given it's the month of Valentine's Day.

RuffleButts and RuggedButts are collections of adorably styled and super soft children's apparel and accessories. This husband and wife founding team were inspired by their own parenthood and their desire for affordable, stylish and well made clothing and accessories for toddlers.
Garden Pops, the Veggie Mama flagship product, are all natural, frozen vegetable and fruit treats.
Rent-A-Goat helps businesses and homeowners landscape their properties in a safe and eco-friendly way, at a competitive price, by clearing their land with goats.

The BareEASE Prep Kit takes the pain out of hair removal in the bikini line area. Designed by Dr. Edna Ma, this kit includes a 4% lidocaine-based numbing lotion and a latex-panty that prevents the lotion from rubbing off, maximizing absorption and its numbing effect. In just 15-20 minutes, the lotion does its work and you can experience the most comfortable bikini line hair removal that there can be.

Be a superhero around the house with FiberFix. This super-adhesive tape is doctored with a water-activated resin that once cured, makes the bond 100 times stronger than duct tape. Fix leaky pipes, broken tool handles, and any number of other broken household items and make them sturdy as new. FiberFix saves you the expense of replacing these items and your valuable time.
Ten Thirty One Productions is an entertainment company that creates, owns, and produces live attractions in the horror genre.
Alternative financing solutions for small businesses.

Elephant Chat encourages couples to address the "elephant in the room". This plush toy elephant helps couples start conversations about divisive issues that they might otherwise struggle to bring up. How do you use Elephant Chat? Just place the toy elephant someplace visible in your home whenever there's something you and your partner need to discuss. Every couple is different, and while Elephant Chat might not be right for everyone, the married duo behind this product have brought it to market because of the positive results that they themselves have experienced in their communications.
An all-electric, jet-propelled body board.
Tree T Pee is an agricultural water conservation and frost protection device.

180CUP is the party time MVP. Just a normal plastic drinking cup at first glance, the 180CUP transforms into a shot glass with a quick flip. With its clever design and bright colors, 180CUP adds to the festive atmosphere while it serves as a drinking cup, shot glass, measuring cup, ash tray, and any other uses your party guests can discover. 180CUP is perfect for picnics, tailgates, and all your other social gatherings.

Better Life produces all-natural cleaning products, including all-purpose cleaners, specialty surface cleaners, soaps and lotions. The company's mission is to make the safest and most effective home cleaning products on the market. Better Life cleaning products are cruelty-free and made in the USA.
Bread pudding reimagined in 108 flavors.
Color spray made with ingredients safe for use on dogs.

Bellybuds is a sound system for your baby, in utero! Babies begin to develop hearing and memories well before birth, but most sounds are muffled, with the exception of the mother's voice. Bellybuds changes that by providing a means for audio stimulation to reach them through the womb. The specially-designed speakers adhere to the belly and safely play music, messages from family, or other soothing sounds of your choosing.

Paparazzi Proposals helps plan and execute memorable marriage proposals and capture the memories for posterity. Whether it's something simple and intimate or a big production, Paparazzi Proposals can help make it happen and ensure you have pictures and video to remember the moment.
Doorbot (now Ring), is a Wi-Fi enabled video doorbell that allows the owner to communicate with visitors and grant access remotely using their smartphone or tablet.

It's slaw, it's salsa--no! It's Slawsa! Meet this bold new condiment category that blends the best elements of slaw and salsa to produce a healthy and flavorful snack topping. Use it in place of relish on burgers and hot dogs, slather it on sandwiches, or dip your tortilla chips in it, there are limitless ways to enjoy the deliciousness. Slawsa comes in a variety of flavors with a salsa base, but they all have the cabbage backbone that underlies any slaw worth its name.
An iPhone app and online marketplace that enables users to turn their pitches into products they can buy, sell and share.

Surprise Ride is a one-of-a-kind subscription service for activities. Each month, Surprise Ride delivers a box full of supplies, lessons and instructions for activities following a theme. From penguins to volcanoes, ancient Egypt, gardening, and space, Surprise Ride is full of ways to nurture and encourage creativity and learning in a playful spirit.

Order unique chocolate bars online, customized down to the very last detail. The Chocomize business is to deliver on-demand custom chocolates direct to the consumer. You can select the type of base chocolate and choose from a wide variety of toppings with up to 300 million possible combinations.  Chocomize also caters to corporate customers looking for unique promotional gifts, as Chocomize's chocolate bars and packaging can also be customized to include their company logo.

Yubo is a better and brighter lunchbox that kids and their parents can appreciate. Children love the interchangeable inserts that go into the front panel, which allows them to change the look of the lunchbox when they please. Parents love that they don't have to buy another lunchbox again! Designed for maximum style and cleanliness, Yubo is also easy to wipe down or even toss in the dishwasher.

Pursecase is an ultra-minimalist purse, built to have room for just your phone and precious few other essentials, such as a bit of cash, your ID and a credit card or two. Not to skimp on style, Pursecase has an attractive chain handle to complete the purse-like look and feel.

Grace and Lace makes fashion-forward frilly socks, scarves and hair accessories. The company grew off the surge in popularity of the layered look of frilly socks peeking out of boots. Grace and Lace also helps the less fortunate. The company puts a portion of every sales into building orphanages in India.

Virtuix Omni is a virtual reality platform based on an omni-directional treadmill that allows the user to move in any direction within their video game. The ability to move naturally within their virtual worlds gives gamers the most thoroughly immersive experience available today.
A line of cool accessories that can easily attach to any kind of safety helmet, transforming it from a chore into a fashion statement.

SpiritHoods are unique accessories that work as a combination of hat, gloves, and scarf. Make in California out of premium faux fur, each SpiritHood is modeled after a specific animal, and 10% of net profits are donated towards the conservation of endangered species.

Bubba's Q BBQ has a proprietary way to prepare and package fully cooked, de-boned baby back ribs. They package these for sale, ready to enjoy after a quick blast in the microwave. Consumers can now enjoy these fully cooked pork ribs with a knife and fork in their own kitchen, as speedily as anything else they might throw in the microwave. The bones are hand-removed before being packaged ensuring the highest quality experience. For extra flavor, you can also opt to cook these boneless ribs in the oven or on the grill. Since they are pre-cooked, they will heat up quickly, in about three to five minutes for each side.

Cashmere Hair produces premium-quality hair extensions with a unique clip-in system that makes them easier and safer to apply and remove than any other. Based in Beverly Hills,  Cashmere Hair's extensions are made of 100% human hair and available in a range of colors to suit any woman in need. Cashmere Hair extensions can also be cut and textured to customize the look and blend in expertly with any woman's natural hair.
Christmas lights strands magnetized at each bulb for easy setup.

Tipsy Elves is a witty brand of clothing that produces items with humorous and irreverent designs. The company started out focused on producing their own modern twist on the ugly sweater. Since receiving their Shark Tank investment from Robert, the Tipsy Elves has expanded outside of holiday-themed clothing but they remain committed to producing high-quality, apparel for men and women, always with a tongue-in-cheek tone. Great for all kinds of gatherings, from ugly sweater parties, to spirit week, to 4th of July cookouts, to St. Patrick's Day pub crawls, and more. Tipsy Elves also produces collegiate clothing, and has partnered with a number of colleges and universities to produce branded sweaters in their school colors.
A Christmas tree topper in the form of a Star of David, for interfaith families to fuse their holidays and celebrate together.
Eyebloc is an adhesive-free cover for built-in laptop cameras.

Bounce Boot Camp uses inflatable bounce houses as fitness equipment. NFL player Thomas Hill runs Bounce Boot Camp, bringing his athletic expertise and passion for fitness to help people get fit in an original and fun way.
An online service from which you can inexpensively order prints of your photos straight from your phone.

Wall Rx is a powerful yet simple way to repair walls. Retailing for less than $10, Wall Rx provides wall repair kits that can fix damage up to 4 inches wide. Easier than regular spackle or plaster, and certainly less expensive than hiring a professional, Wall Rx kits include everything you need to make it look like nothing happened there at all. The kits bring a clear disc, a frame with a special drywall compound, and sandpaper. You won't need to spend money on any other tools to get your wall looking like new again.

Harvested from the nutrient-rich shores of the Arctic wilderness, Alaska Glacial Mud products offer moisturizing, anti-aging, and protective properties for your skin. Run by an energetic and self-reliant commercial fisherman by the name of Lauren Padawer, Alaska Glacial Mud is a premium line of all-natural personal care products enriched with organic and wild botanical extracts from the Copper River, and embodies the natural beauty and spirit of the Pacific Northwest.

invisiPlug makes powerstrips that seamlessly blend into your hardwood floors. How do they pass unnoticed when most power strips are eyesores? Simple, invisiPlug is the chameleon among power strips. They are literally made in wood-colored finishes such as Medium Cherry and Dark Oak, so they match the color and textures of your actual floor.
A company that books balloon artists to entertain children at dining establishments.

School lockers can be a mess, can't they? It's not anyone's fault, because it's just plain difficult to keep things orderly when there's no structure. This father-daughter team devised a solution. LockerBones are shelves for your locker. This unique shelving system has pieces that fit together like a puzzle, making it easy to assemble and resulting in sturdy shelves that keep all your school essentials in their place.
Quality baby moccassins.

FitDeck creates new workout routines on the go. Choose between a deck of cards or an iPhone app and off you go! Each time you shuffle the cards or run the app, FitDeck devises a new combination of 40 different exercises, accompanied by illustrated instructions to perform them effectively and safely. Portable and fun, FitDeck keeps your workout routine fresh and varied.

SwimZip is sun protection that's easy to put on, and that goes a long way when you're dealing with toddlers! With its signature zipper down the front, SwimZip goes on in a zippy jiffy to provide ample sun protection for babies, toddlers, and fast-growing big kids. This sun-protective clothing is also designed to be stylish yet affordable, making it a no-brainer to stay sun-safe.
Chewable caplets that aim to reduce appetite.

The Cycloramic app cleverly makes use of your iPhone's vibrating motor to make 360-degree panoramic images, no need for a tripod, swivel or any other accessories required. Available on the iTunes App Store, the Cycloramic app is programmed to make the phone spin and take pictures on its own account. As a user, just stand your iPhone on a flat surface and press GO. The iPhone will take multiple pictures while rotating and later stitch them together into a striking panorama and opening the image in an immersive 3D viewer.
Single-serve milk treat for kids, flavored to taste like cereal milk.
Gourmet cookie dough made to be eaten and enjoyed without baking.

Nexersys is at the intersection of gaming and exercising, what they call the growing exer-gaming market. Nexersys provides unique fitness equipment for home gyms, commercial gyms, and arcades. Their machines feature a large screen display and a number of padded targets that users interact with. From the display, Nexersys delivers fitness routines and a virtual trainer to take the user through high-intensity intervals.

Diamond Dallas Page puts the DDP in DDP Yoga. This three-time World Championship Wrestling Heavyweight Champion designed DDP Yoga to aid in his recovery from a severe back injury. This program combines the best elements of traditional fitness training, sports therapy, yoga  flows, and dynamic resistance to create a workout that is highly effective while having minimal impact on joints and ligaments.

Southern Culture Foods makes flavored pancake and waffle mixes and other breakfast products. As a company, Souther Culture Foods wants to change how people think about breakfast, and stands for natural breakfast lifestyle products, including a seasoning blend for bacon called Bacon Rub.
A safety and survival course developed by former CIA officer.

Moberi isn't just a smoothie, it's a lifestyle, and it's about being healthy, having fun, and of course, making delicious drinks. Based in Portland, these food carts are bicycle-powered smoothie-making stations. Customers are encouraged to hop on the bike to power the mixer that blends their smoothies, or they can stand back and let the staff do the pedaling.

Cheeked bridges the gap between online dating and real-world romance. Members are instructed to distribute special-made cards to prospective dates they meet in "real life" in order to entice them to flirt online.

Buzzy helps administer shots comfortably to kids and anyone who's made uncomfortable by the prospect of getting pricked. Created by a pediatrician, Buzzy blocks pain with high frequency vibration and built-in ice packs, making those necessary but unpleasant shots less stressful than ever.
Children's bedding designed to make it simple to make the bed. In one step, the bed can be zipped up to look neat and orderly again.

Bambooee is a strong, absorbent, and reusable alternative to paper towels. Made from bamboo, Bambooee sheets have the appearance of regular paper towels, but they're reusable and even machine-washable. Each roll of Bambooee sheets comes with 20 sheets, which replaces up to 60 paper towel rolls. These reusable cloths don't just save you money, they reduce waste. Every roll of Bambooee is made from sustainably-sourced organic bamboo.

Ever wanted to put a bell your baby so you can hear where they're getting into at all times? Squeeky Knees has made something even better: stylish baby clothes with knee pads that make a fun squeaky sound as the kids crawl. The knee pads provide protection and amusing sounds that babies love, and that parents can use to help them supervise.

The Buffer Bit brings the power of your drill bit to the activities of shoe shining and automotive detailing. The Buffer Bit attaches to any cordless drill to produce outstanding shine and polish to shoes, cars, motorcycles, and boats.

RevoLights provides the ultimate bicycle lighting system for safety and visibility. These programmed light rings attach to your wheels. RevoLights illuminate the path ahead for the rider and function as brake lights like no other system.

U-Lace makes elastic shoelace inserts that you can customize according to different colors and patterns. U-Lace transforms any pair of sneakers into slip-on shoes, reinventing the whole look in the process.

As an 10-year-old, Henry learned about Colony Collapse Disorder from a local beekeper in Western Washington. For his 11th birthday, he asked for (and received) a beehive. The rest is history. Henry has created a line of all-natural spiced honey, harvested from his very own apiary. You can get Henry's Humdingers in any of four flavors: Grumpy Grandpa (red pepper and garlic), Naughty Nana (spicy ginger), Phoebe's Fireball (chipotle and cinnamon), and Diabolical Dad (habanero and lime). A portion of the profits goes the Foundation for the Preservation of Honey Bees. Not sure what you would even do with spicy honey? Visit Henry's website for recipes!

With the Define Bottle, you can make your own fruit-infused water to take on-the-go. The striking and eco-friendly design makes a fashion statement while allowing for any desired combination of fresh fruit, teas and herbal infusions. A great way to sidestep tempting sugary drinks like sodas, the Define Bottle is available in several sizes ranging from the ultra-portable 7-oz model to the full-sized 17 oz. bottle.

As smartphones, tablets and other devices continue to multiply through our lives, electronics are fast becoming a significant portion of our waste products, one which most consumers are still learning how to manage responsibly. iReTron was created to help reduce electroncis waste by providing a convenient avenue for reuse. This service will help consumers sell, upgrade or recycle their latest iPhone, iPad or other device in a fast and easy way.
A new skin protectant that paints on a bandage, available in a range of skin tones and fun colors for kids. Boo Boo Goo protects skin from irritation and is environmentally-friendly.

Garage doors are an overlooked security vulnerability in many homes, and Elocksys has created its patented Garage Door lock to help remediate that. The Garage Door Lock is a patented deadbolt locking system that uses rolling code technology. It responds only to your Elocksys-made remotes and no other store-bought alternatives.
Packback rents digital textbooks for $5 or less and allows students to compare prices when buying or selling textbooks.

Morninghead is like a shower cap, but it keeps water IN instead of OUT. And the time you would want to do that is in the morning, when you wake up with bed head that crimps your style. Morninghead looks like a shower cap, but has an absorbent material on the inside that holds a solid helping of water without dripping. BeeSweet Lemonade uses locally sourced honey. A percentage of the profits form the sale of her lemonade goes to  local and international organizations fighting to save the bees.

Flavored face wipes sweetened with stevia. Makes cleaning kids' faces easier because they won't avoid it thanks to its sweet flavor.

Using PittMoss instead of peat eliminates the need for chemical additives and controls for pH imbalances, insects, molds and weed seeds, and releases far less CO2 into the atmosphere.

Started in 2011 by three-time world record Striped Bass angler Greg Myerson, the World Record Striper Company manufacturers and sells the same science-based fishing tackle Myerson used to land each of his monster fish. The company sells sinkers, floats, jigs and bucktails which incorporate Myerson's patent-pending Rattle sound that attracts big fish from a variety of species by mimicking the sound of one of the favorite foods: crustaceans.

Frameri answers the question, "Why aren't your glasses as flexible as the rest of your wardrobe?" With Frameri interchangeable frames and lenses, you can change your glasses as easily as you change your outfit. Now you can buy the optical or sun lenses with or without prescription and snap them into the frames you want, saving you money and removing the stress of feeling stuck in just one pair.

The Paleo Diet Bar is a nutrition bar that is gluten, soy, dairy and preservative free. It contains egg protein which is a source of all nine amino acids that can only be derived from food and has high concentrations of BCAAs, leucine, isoleucine and valine.

Zero Pollution Motors is launching the urban car of the future, the AIRPod. The AIRPod vehicle is the solution to urban pollution and urban mobility. With its small size, a tiny price, zero pollution, and a fun and futuristic design, AIRPod marks a turning point in the range of urban vehicles. It is a real breath of fresh air in cities and the prelude to travel without pollution.

You can be an action figure, and You Kick Ass can make that happen! With just a photo of yourself or a friend, You Kick Ass makes a 3D-printed action figure, and will even give you an action hero name and super power.

Sunscreen Mist adds another point of access for sunscreen application in the form of spray stations and booths located at hotels, amusement parks, beaches, and other outdoors events. Rather than apply sunscreen from a bottle, customers can pay per use with a quick swipe of a credit card of a hotel key card. In a matter of seconds, the booths and spray stations provide an even application of sunscreen for the whole body.

SynDaver Labs makes synthetic body parts for use in medical education, which can replace the use of cadavers, live animals, and human patients in surgical training. SynDaver's models are highly sophisticated and realistic, and their flagship product, the SynDaver Synthetic Human is the only full-body surgical simulator. The Synthetic Human bleeds, breathes, and features hundreds of replaceable muscles, bones, organs, and other body parts.

Zoom Interiors is a virtual service for interior design that delivers personalized style at accessible price points. Users fill out a survey to give Zoom a sense for their style, then follow on with a free 15-minute telephone consultation. For just $150, customers can get a room designed with budgets starting as low as $1,000.

Spikeball started out as a casual outdoors game, but has grown to become a national sensation. Played in a 2 vs. 2 format, teams compete to spike a ball into a bouncy net until one team can't return it, which awards their opposing team a point. This nascent sport is often described as a cross between beach volleyball and foursquare. Spikeball's popularity has been growing, and currently there are over a quarter million players in the United States, as well as over a thousand nationally ranked teams.

Shark Wheel is out to literally reinvent the wheel. Their innovative wheel design is not circular, it's Q-shaped, to put it as simply as possible. This shape may look funny, but it makes wheels faster and gives them better grip. Over uneven terrain, it also makes for a smoother ride. The team has put Shark Wheel on skateboards, strollers, wagons, and they see countless other possibilities for it. The flagship product currently in production is the skateboard wheels, which have been selling online.

Adriana Montano wants to open the first Cat Cafe in Florida. At a cafe such as this one, patrons pay an admission fee ($9 in this case) to come in and play with the kitties, maybe while sipping a coffee or enjoying a book. All the cats at the Cafe will be up for adoption, so this becomes a way for people without pets to enjoy their company and provides another channel to help rescue cats get adopted and find forever homes.

Sway Motorsports makes a three-wheeled, all-electric, street legal ride. It's not like other motorcycles or scooters on the market because its control mechanism. Affording riders a slightly wider footprint and the ability to control the tilt of the vehicle with their legs, Sway vehicles offer greater stability and tighter turns. Riders don't have to struggle to balance the vehicle or put their foot down at stops, and for the same reason, it's also easier to carry a passenger or baggage on Sway vehicles.
